title: Post Attributed Conversion Events
description: Post Attributed Conversion Events. Conversion Path can contain at the most 10 events that contributed to the conversion event.

xdm:triggerType.title: Trigger Event Type
xdm:triggerType.description:: Trigger Type for an Event - examples include click, impression

xdm:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
xdm:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.

xdm:displaycampaignId.title: Display Campaign Identifier
xdm:displaycampaignId.description: Campaign ID on the display advertising platform.

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Campaign ID on the search advertising platform.

xdm:placementId.title: Placement Identifier
xdm:placementId.description: Placement ID on the display advertising platform.

xdm:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
xdm:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform.

xdm:displayadId.title: Display Ad Identifier
xdm:displayadId.description: Ad ID on the display advertising platform.

xdm:adId.title: Ad Identifier
xdm:adId.description: Ad ID on the search advertising platform.

xdm:term.title: Search Term
xdm:term.description: Search Term that contributed to the conversion.

xdm:termId.title: Search Term Identifier
xdm:termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform.

xdm:matchType.title: Term Match Type
xdm:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad.

xdm:referrerUrl.title: Referrer URL
xdm:referrerUrl.description: The referrer is the webpage that sends visitors to your site using a link.

xdm:searchTerm.title: Search Term
xdm:searchTerm.description: Original Term used for the Search

xdm:geoiplocationId.title: Geo IP Location Identifier
xdm:geoiplocationId.description: Location ID based on Geographical IP

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Property Name Configured by Pixel, Analytics, Custom Feeds

xdm:clickthroughValue.title: Click Through Value
xdm:clickthroughValue.description: Raw Conversion Value if Triggering Event Type is Click

xdm:clickthroughCount.title: Click Through Count
xdm:clickthroughCount.description: Raw Conversion Count if Triggering Event Type is Click

xdm:viewthroughValue.title: View Through Value
xdm:viewthroughValue.description: Raw Conversion Value if Triggering Event Type is Impression

xdm:viewthroughCount.title: View Through Count
xdm:viewthroughCount.description: Raw Conversion Count if Triggering Event Type is Click

xdm:clickviewthroughValue.title: Click View Through Value
xdm:clickviewthroughValue.description: Raw conversion value if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

xdm:clickviewthroughCount.title: Click View Through Count
xdm:clickviewthroughCount.description: Raw conversion Count if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

xdm:viewclickthroughValue.title: View Click Through Value
xdm:viewclickthroughValue.description: Raw conversion value if trigger event is impression but clicks  present in path

xdm:viewclickthroughCount.title: View View Through Count
xdm:viewclickthroughCount.description: Raw conversion count if trigger event is impression but clicks  present in path

xdm:pathSize.title: Path Size
xdm:pathSize.description: Path Size of Trigger Event Types

xdm:productId.title: Product Identifier
xdm:productId.description: Product Id on the search advertising platform.

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: The device from where the ad was displayed.

xdm:impressionUid.title: Impression UID
xdm:impressionUid.description: Unique Identifier of the Impression Event

xdm:attrLocations.title: Attributed Locations
xdm:attrLocations.description: Attributed Locations for the event. For Display, this stores Thrift encoded object.

xdm:rlsaId.title: Remarketing Lists Identifier
xdm:rlsaId.description: Remarketing Lists ID for Search Ads
